readable.title: 2944193661_7b255af9cc
readable.content: A man asleep on a yellow striped bench with his feet on a baggage cart . A man in a sweatshirt and blue jeans is taking a nap on a bench . A man in jeans resting on a striped bench with his feet on a luggage cart A man is asleep on a bench in the subway . A man sleeping on a bench in a subway station .
